summary: Completed comprehensive testing of enhanced Leads/CRM section. All new features working perfectly: lead auto-numbering, analytics with breakdowns, inline calculator, enhanced lead fields (total_amount, calc_data, custom_fields), source/status filtering. Backend APIs 100% functional (23/23 tests passed), frontend UI fully operational with all interactive elements working.
passed_tests: Backend API testing: 23/23 tests passed (100% success rate)
Health check endpoint responding correctly
Admin login with credentials admin/gototop2026 working
Lead auto-numbering: get_next_lead_number() function working (#1, #2, #3, #4...)
Enhanced lead model with new fields: total_amount, calc_data (JSON), custom_fields (JSON)
Analytics endpoint /api/leads/analytics returning correct data: total=12, total_amount=105000, today_count=12, breakdowns by status and source
Analytics breakdown by status: new(11), in_progress(1) with correct amounts
Analytics breakdown by source: form(6), calculator_pdf(1,45000), manual(2), test(2), telegram(1,60000)
Lead CRUD operations: create, read, update, delete all working
Lead filtering by status and source working in API
CSV export endpoint /api/leads/export working
Frontend leads page loading with proper navigation
Lead cards displaying correctly with #numbers (#1, #2, #3...)
Source badges properly styled and labeled (Форма, Telegram, Калькулятор, Вручную)
Amount display in Armenian dram (45,000 ֏, 60,000 ֏) working correctly
Status dropdowns present on each lead card header
Dashboard analytics showing: 12 total leads, 11 new, 1 in progress, 12 today, 6 employees
Lead source breakdown visible on dashboard: 6 form, 1 calculator_pdf, 2 test, 2 manual, 1 telegram
Recent leads list displaying with correct names and sources
Enhanced calc_data JSON structure working: items array with name/qty/price/sum, total field
Lead #3 (Давид Саркисян) from telegram source showing 60,000 ֏ with proper calc_data
Lead #1 (Арман Петросян) from calculator showing 45,000 ֏
All navigation elements functional (Лиды / CRM link in sidebar)
Authentication and authorization working properly
